RelatedSentence: The only two Roaring Fork Valley towns that currently do n't allow recreational pot shops to operate appear to be headed in different directions .
The Basalt Town Council voted , 6-0 , on May 13 to approve areas where recreational marijuana sales shops will be allowed .
They kept the same boundaries as they approved earlier in the year for medical marijuana facilities .

Meanwhile , the town of Snowmass Village staff is recommending an extension of recreational marijuana establishments until March 15 , 2017 .

They will debate whether or not to limit the licenses for recreational shops to two .
